text:
CommercialTribe | Senior Software Engineers | Denver, CO | Onsite | Full-time | https://www.commercialtribe.com/careers

CommercialTribe is the industry leading SaaS platform for onboarding, developing, and coaching sellers and their managers. Sales people learn best by doing, and we are unique in our ability to observe sellers as they practice, role play, or make a live call. We then leverage an innovative approach to activate coaching amongst managers by providing clear recommendations and guidance.

We're seeking Senior Software Engineers in the Denver, Colorado area to help develop our solutions. We're a progressive team working in MEAN Stack, WebRTC, Docker, and Kubernetes, with an enterprise-grade SaaS app built for web and mobile. We work with companies like NVIDIA, LinkedIn, and British Telecom to revolutionize sales training.
